title: spec: tweak wording in Constants section
body:
by **feedback.test.account**: 
https://feedback.corp.google.com/#/Report/1051285106

Description:
The first line says there are 6 constant types, including rune, but no mention of
character constant.

The second line says that a character constant is a numeric constant.  But says nothing
about runes.  I think they meant to say a rune constant is numeric.

UI language: en
Detected language: en
